title: Sona's DJ Doesn't Change Her Voice
body: So, the other day when I decided to go AP Sona mid, I noticed that I could understand her voiceover lines. It feels really weird to be in Concussive mode and hear her say, "Elegantly." or "Brioso, Brioso!" Is this happening with anyone else?

replies.body: I've had it happen a few times where it does play the base voice pack but she does have her own remixed/backwards one where you can't really understand it.

Hey Turritop,

DJ Sona has mixed lines (many of which you won't be able to make out), but there are a few that you may recognize. As long as they're not the base VO lines, this is working as intended.
